name: Survival Jack
description:
Help Jack and his friends in this Top Down Survival Shooter  against an horde of many kinds of zombies, guide him through many levels and get guns to get rig all your zombie enemies. 

★ FEATURES

- More than 20 weapons available

- Many characters to unlock

- Many Fun levels

- Big horde of smart zombies

- This is an offline game

- Top down view

- Beautiful Soundtrack

This is the best Survival top down shooter, get rid of that zombie's horde. Download it now!
